title: S17 Ep38: Supernatural News/Parashare: Haunted Dolls and Poetry Slams Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Haunted Dolls and Poetry Slams Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents: Supernatural News/Parashare: Haunted Dolls and Poetry Slams Edition!

It has been just as weird of a week on the other side of the veil as it has been on this side, and Tim and Bruiser are covering it all!

This week, The Ghost Adventures Crew run into a shop in Carmel that is overrun by Haunted Dolls! A 16th century ghost in England communicates to a man through his computer through poetry and tells him he is not happy that he stole his house, and that he fancies his wife! and a tech sargeant in the Air Force in the 50's waxes nostalgiac through his poetry about UFO's!

Find out where you can see Beer City Bruiser near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester

Darkness Radio has partnered up with the UFO Disclosure Symposium, get your tickets here: https://ufodisclosuresymposium.com/?ref=tim%40darknessradio.com
